name: Foxventures
description:
Foxventures is a classic platformer where you play as a brave fox.
You are going on a journey through the lands inhabited by various enemies. Help the fox go through all obstacles, cope with all enemies and reach the end of the lands.
But you need to be careful, because on the way you will be waiting for ambushes with difficult places.

To control the player, use the arrows on the keyboard and the left mouse button.
The goal of the game is to destroy all monsters, stay alive and complete all levels.

Game featuress:
- Nice minimalistic graphics.
- 10 levels with a unique approach to passing.
- Several types of enemies with different characteristicsand abilities.

Play and enjoy the game.
